amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to enforce the Executive Order which encourages Federal agencies to require project labor agreements (PLA's) on Federal construction projects exceeding $25 million in costs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement or enforce Executive Order 13502.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 216 (Roll no. 225).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 216 (Roll no. 225).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Perry.
